amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the funding for the new Advanced Manufacturing Technology Consortia (AmTech) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding out of Advanced Manufacturing Technology Consortia by $21 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quayle amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 259 (Roll no. 208).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quayle amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 259 (Roll no. 208).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Quayle.
